comment._content: É uma bela captura!!! It's a beautiful capture!!!

comment.author: 34419668@N08
comment._content: C'est "le Pont de Palmstedt", (Palmstedtska bron) de 1784, detruit en 1867. Encore une vielle photo: www.stockholmskallan.se/Soksida/Post/?nid=14534 Aujourd'hui le pont s'appelle "le Pont de Riddarholmen" (Riddarholmsbron): en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Riddarholmsbron /Anna Boman Swedish National Heritage Board (La direction Nationale Suédoise du Patrimoine)

comment.author: 72869172@N08
comment._content: Here is another great image of the bridge: commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Riddarholmsbron_1841a.jpg And here are its remains today, I think: commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Gamla_Riddarholmsbron_200...
